item.description:
Weekly workshop, Cambridge style. New members are welcome. Please bring copies of whatever recent drafts you'd like the group to discuss, and feel free also to bring any new publications or periodicals you think we'd profit from knowing about.

** This week, we will be having a theme to our meetup. As autumn wends its way into winter, we will be featuring works that relate to the outgoing season. So bring your autumnal poetry, or particular works you've read that would be of interest to the group. **
item.name: Weekly Writer's Workshop - Central Square
